title: [HOLD for payment 2024-08-09] [$250] Categorizing - Page blinks after selecting a category during categorization
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: Precondition:
- Account has no workspace
1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go to self DM
3. Track a manual expense
4. Click Categorize it from the actionable whisper
5. Select any category

Expected result: Page will not blink after selecting a category during categorization

Actual result: None
